monster.name: Hyena

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 331, Princes of the Apocalypse
